title: Fix level backgrounds parity
description: Unity 2017 port (MvLR-wiiu) shows dark/incorrect sky + letterbox compared to Unity 6 source (NSMB-MarioVsLuigi). Bring background color/tiling/parallax/camera setup to parity so sky+clouds fill viewport and match brightness.

title: Grassland bushes should be transparent over background
description: In Unity 2017 port, grassland background now shows but foreground bushes still block the deep mushroom background with an opaque band. Unity 6 uses separate Background + Foreground sprites from grass-sky with alpha on the foreground. Implement layered background rendering so bushes foreground uses transparency over the mushroom layer.
close_reason: Render grass-sky as back+foreground slices so bushes alpha reveals mushrooms
